title: 14 fabulous hotels for woodland walks in Britain, from Fort William to the New Forest
text: Winnie the Pooh once said, "You can't stay in your corner of the Forest waiting for others to come to you. You have to go to them sometimes." With this in mind, we’ve rounded up some of the best hotels with woodland walks so you can explore windswept woods and enchanting ancient forests, including the place that inspired A.A. Milne's Hundred Acre Wood itself. These are some of Britain's best re-tree-ts, in locations including Dalby Forest, Ashdown Forest, the New Forest, Leanachan Forest, the Brecon Beacons, Galloway Forest, the Lake District and the Forest of Dean (so lush, you won’t want to leaf).
description: The best hotels for woodland walks in Britain in locations including the Brecon Beacons, New Forest, Lake District, Dalby Forest and the Forest of Dean.
